GAME.name: Your Room
GAME.look: The coldness of your room chills you to the bone, you see a door to the south. ~ hallway key

GAME.name: The Hallway
GAME.look: A horror movies dream place, a half open door is to your east and south, your bedroom door is still open. ~ living room key

GAME.name: The Closet
GAME.look: A nice smell fills your nose as you smell the dead rat beside you, good thing you left the door to your west open. ~ dining room key

GAME.name: The Movie Room
GAME.look: Good memories fill your brain, then get smushed by the darkness, the hallway is north of you, a door is to your east and south. ~ front door key

GAME.name: The Play Room
GAME.look: Your old toys give you joy in this cold darkness, the door you came through is north. ~ office key

GAME.name: The Living Room
GAME.look: You can see the white moon seeping through the front door to the south, your fathers faveroute place is to the east. ~ play room key

GAME.name: The Office
GAME.look: You dont recognize this place as your father never let you in, unless to go to the kitchen, south and north are where doors are. ~ kitchen key

GAME.name: The Dining Room
GAME.look: You get a tad bit starved seeing this place, a door is to the south and a hidden door is down below your feet. ~ dark room key

GAME.name: The Dark Room
GAME.look: You are to afraid to open your eyes, but the smell of food is drawing you west.

GAME.name: The Kitchen
GAME.look: You see the dirty white floors and the tinted windows as you make your way in, you better go back east. ~ mud room key

GAME.name: The Mud Room
GAME.look: The smell of fresh air make you feel like life might be worth living, you can see your lawn south.

GAME.name: Outside
GAME.look: Nothing but blue skys and sunshine.
